sn55.45:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo mahāyaso’ti vuccati.
sn55.45:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.45:2.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.45:2.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn55.45:2.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ‘aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo mahāyaso’ti vuccatī”ti.
